briefTitle: Mindful Movement in Women Receiving Adjuvant or Neoadjuvant Therapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Role of Mindful Movement in Women Receiving Adjuvant or Neoadjuvant Therapy for Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Feasibility of enrolling patients to larger randomized controlled trial using yoga and mindful movement as measured the number of eligible patients enrolled
eligibilityCriteria:
Eligibility Critera:

* Age ≥ 18.
* Female.
* Newly diagnosed with Stage I-III breast cancer.
* Scheduled to undergo neoadjuvant or adjuvant chemotherapy or neoadjuvant endocrine therapy.
* Not currently regularly practicing yoga (defined as at least once a month).
* Able to read and understand English
* Able to understand and willing to sign an IRB-approved written informed consent document
